name: Grace M.
comment: Thanks to understanding monetization, my baking videos finally started earning!

name: Ronald K.
comment: I hit 3 million Shorts views and qualified fast. Consistency is key!

comment: Knowing the requirements upfront saved me time and helped me focus my strategy.

comment: I focused on long-form tutorials and reached 4,000 watch hours in 5 months.

comment: The 1,000 subscriber goal felt impossible, but my Shorts boosted me past it!

comment: Understanding monetization helped me plan my content around real growth.
